item.title: Solving the mathematics of Factorio Quality: Pure Recycler Loop
item.description: The pure recycler loop is the simplest possible way to grind for legendary items, making it the logical next step of our quality analysis journey. Armed with the knowledge we gained from the previous post of this series, we’re going to calculate the efficiency of this quality grinding method and do some statistical analysis of how the production of quality items is affected by the quality chance of the recyclers.

item.title: Solving the mathematics of Factorio Quality: The Fundamentals
item.description: Prologue Link to heading Video games have this incredible ability to evoque certain feelings and states of mind on the people that play them. You can experience pretty much every emotion, starting from happiness, amazement, and wonder going all the way to sadness, frustation, and heartbreak. Games can make you laugh and cry, they can make you focus, and sometimes they make you think. Factorio is a game that makes you think.
